title: Is This Bert Show Member's Request Of Their Husband Irrational?
description:
Do you trust the self-driving feature on newer cars? In Cassie's case, she HATES the feature. She doesn't believe it's as safe as advertised, but her husband disagrees.
Is she being irrational when she tells him not to use it if she's in the car?
